summary: THE VEHICLE WAS SERVICED ON 4/1/03 FOR THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT.  ON 4/14/03 CONSUMER ENTERED A PARKING LOT AND TURNED OFF VEHICLE IGNITION.  CONSUMER RESTARTED THE VEHICLE, HEARD A THUMP, AND NOTICED THE BATTERY INDICATOR LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED.   THE DEALER DIAGNOSED THAT THE SERPENTINE BELT POPPED.  *NLM
